data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Abrantes, Eduardo Assis, Mendonça, Maria Cleide De (2009): A new species of Psammisotoma Greenslade and Deharveng (Collembola: Isotomidae) from Brazil. Zootaxa 2295: 25-30, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.191546
